briefTitle: A Study of Roxadustat for the Treatment of Anemia in Participants With Chronic Kidney Disease and Not Receiving Dialysis
officialTitle: A Phase 3, Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo Controlled Study of the Efficacy and Safety of Roxadustat (FG-4592) for the Treatment of Anemia in Chronic Kidney Disease Patients Not on Dialysis
summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether roxadustat is safe and effective in the treatment of anemia in participants with chronic kidney disease and not on dialysis.

primaryOutcome.measure: United States (US FDA) Submission: Mean Change From Baseline in Hb (g/dL) Over Weeks 28 to 52 Regardless of Rescue Therapy
